properties.areaDesc: Mexico Bay NY to the St. Lawrence River; Hamlin Beach to Sodus Bay NY; Sodus Bay to Mexico Bay NY
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 9 at 2:16PM EST until January 10 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds to 30 knots and waves 4 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Ontario from Hamlin Beach
to the Saint Lawrence River.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 3 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Winds and/or waves will cause hazardous conditions
that could capsize or damage small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM EST FRIDAY
